title: Archie Thompson's A-League career in doubt after serious injury | Football
content:
Melbourne Victory[1] coach Kevin Muscat should have been celebrating winning through to the FFA Cup semi-finals and the confident debut of new signing Oliver Bozanic, but instead was left lamenting a potentially career-ending injury to veteran star forward Archie Thompson.
The 36-year-old Thompson, who has been capped 54 times by the Socceroos, was recently granted a one-year contract extension but now faces an anxious wait for the results of scans on what appears a serious knee injury.
